pgrid.core.index
Class IndexTable

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.core.index.IndexTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBIndexTable
public class IndexTable
extends DefaultHandler

This class represents the PGridP2P facility. It is responsible for all activities in the Gridella network (search, exchange). This class implements the Singleton pattern as defined by Gamma et.al. As there could only exist one instance of this class, other clients must use the sharedInstance function to use this class.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Method Detail

touch

public void touch()
Set the stat of the data table to unsaved so that next time the save method is called the data table will be written down.

This method must be used when a modification to the data table is conducted outside of RoutingTable class.
